O jogo é incrivel e desafiante, possui gráficos muito agradáveis e jogabilidade ótima, com comandos simples, sem contar que é muito leve, roda até na minha fritadeira elétrica de 1.8Ghz. Sua história é muito empolgante e vale a pena conhecer, tem uma duração curta (a não ser que você seja um acéfalo que não consegue resolver os puzzles do jogo) mas é super envolvente, ainda sim, há mapas diferentes caso você procure por mais desafios após concluir a história, recomendo demais!
绝对不能错过的优质作品，尤其是地面跟吊顶相对放门太好玩了

There's not a lot to say about this game that hasn't already been said, the concept is brilliant and it never gets boring.
This is the first game I've completed on Steam, and I'll probably try and complete Portal 2 now that the mechanics are fresh in my mind.

Esse jogo é um clássico, muito bom mesmo, de verdade. Não fiquei entediado por um segundo. E o segundo jogo é tipo impecável, divertido demais. Fazem 3 anos que eu joguei tanto o portal 1 quanto o 2, e eu sempre me pego pensando nesses jogos e voltando pra jogar mais uma vez. É daqueles jogos que a gente sempre vai se lembrar.
One of the best stories and puzzles ever made

potal

Not much I can say that hasn't been said before. Great puzzle mechanics that are intuitive to learn but a pleasing challenge to figure out how to apply when solving the puzzles. The graphics have held up quite well over time, and the music and atmosphere are wonderfully unique. Portal's a classic game that I think everyone should play.

It's also one of very few first person POV games I can play without getting motion sick. That's like 10 extra points of awesome for me.
Short and very concise, well designed puzzles with just enough staging and atmosphere to be intriguing. The challenge modes add another level of challenge and are all well done.
es increible, aunque aveces si me tarde en hacer los puzles y me encanta la cancion del final
Fun cool puzzle solving with a gun. Just finished it. buy it or die.

This game is great. You play as Chell, an unwilling test subject, as you make your way through 19 test chambers. GLaDOS, a seemingly helpful guide, introduces you to the many hazardous obstacles encountered throughout the game. However, she reveals her true intention; she wants to kill you. You must find GLaDOS' central chamber and kill her. Very early in the game, you get a device, known as the Aperture Science Handheld Portal Device, you can use to make your own portals. To complete the game, and kill GLaDOS, you must manipulate objects, including yourself, through portals. There are also some challenges for skilled players. Overall, even though this game is short in length, it's very fun, and it offers unique and challenging gameplay.
Не очень... Но все равно сойдет. Озвучка тоже самое
It was very fun but kinda hard.

GOD this game is great. And for the Steam Summer Sale making this and Portal 2 for $3 together, it's a steal. This game is so fun and was surprising to me, a first time player and seer since I have never seen a playthrough of this or beaten it until now.

Portal ist meiner Meinung nach kein schlechtes Spiel, aber es ist sehr kurz. Die Rätsel sind teilweise echt knifflig, aber immer machbar. Der Humor ist besonders am Ende sehr witzig und die Story ist ganz ok geschrieben. Wenn das Spiel jedoch nicht im Sale ist (2 Euro), dann kann man bestimmt besseres finden. Jedoch wie gesagt, bereuen werdet ihr es (hoffentlich) nicht.

Portal is good.

The puzzles are challenging, the portals are unique & interesting, the story, while short, is simple & engaging. This is a small game that will take you no more than 3 hours to complete, but it is a fun experience that you should try.

I give it a 7/10.

Купил на летней распродаже Стим 2021 по 80% скидке. Прикольная игрушка от любимой компании, так ещё и на старом добром движке. Есть над чем подумать. Задумка с портальной пушкой вообще огонь. Основную сюжетку прошёл за 3 часа. Благо есть дополнительные уровни которые продлят зависание в игре ещё на 5-6 часиков, но брать без скидки или с маленькой скидкой не советую. В прошлом году на летней распродаже она вообще была по 90% скидке, но я просрал момент.
Ставлю игре 8/10. 
Объяснять нет смысла, всё ровно никто не будет читать мой отзыв.
游玩时间就这么多，个人感觉还行，结尾的歌好听。音乐不错哦
